diagram_logic_form: Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $O$ and $M$.
Point $R$ also lies on the line connecting $P$ and $N$.
line_instances: There are lines $MN$, $MO$, $NO$, and $OP$, forming the rhombus $MNOP$.
There are lines $MR$, $NR$, $OR$, and $PR$, connecting the vertices of the rhombus to the point $R$.
